Title: Wheel Inside the Wheel
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Michael Russo, Michael Narducci, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries"), Marguerite MacIntyre (story editor)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Cami teams up with Marcel and Gia after she becomes suspicious of her faculty advisor Vincent. Lastly, in a surprising turn of events, Klaus comes face-to-face with a visitor from his past.
